Trim ostomy bag baseplate.sentence: The nurse prepares the necessary tools for trimming the ostomy bag baseplate.
Trim ostomy bag baseplate.subject: The nurse

Trim ostomy bag baseplate.sentence: The patient cleans the skin around the stoma with an adhesive remover.
Trim ostomy bag baseplate.subject: The patient

Trim ostomy bag baseplate.sentence: The nurse measures the stoma's size using a measuring guide.
Trim ostomy bag baseplate.subject: The nurse

Trim ostomy bag baseplate.sentence: The nurse trims the ostomy bag baseplate according to the measured size.
Trim ostomy bag baseplate.subject: The nurse

Trim ostomy bag baseplate.sentence: The nurse applies the trimmed baseplate to the patient's skin around the stoma.
Trim ostomy bag baseplate.subject: The nurse
